title: Chroma skins
body: i have been wondering, about the chroma skins. say i buy tristana's rocket girl punk orange, and i dont own the rocket girl skin. will i get the skin?

replies.body: The chroma is an extension of an unlocked skin, meaning you won't be able to use the chroma unless you own Rocket Girl Tristana.  You can purchase the pack in its entirety instead of individually, which should include the skin.  Hope that helps!
thanks! helps alot! now i know not to waste ip on certain skin while this promo is running :)
